SELECT USER_NO, USER_ID, USER_PW, USER_NAME, USER_EMAIL, USER_ROLE, USER_PHOTO, USER_ACTIVE, USER_DISTINCT, USER_REGDATE FROM USER_INFO WHERE USER_NO = #{user_no}
